name: Voin
details: Crafted by a solo developer, VOIN is a first-person hack-and-slash. Cleave through hordes of enemies in fast-paced combat. Explore dark fantasy realms filled with secrets and dangers. Discover powerful gear and weapons, and face menacing bosses in your quest to cleanse a broken world.

name: The Cabin Factory
details: Welcome to The Cabin Factory - as a newly hired Cabin Inspector your job is to inspect the cabins and determine whether or not they are haunted.

name: Ballionaire
details:
Ballionaire is a physics-driven roguelike game full of kinetic chaos, developed by newobject and published by Raw Fury.

Key Features:
Bonk Your Way to Victory: Drop a ball to bonk triggers, earn money, and spawn more balls. Draft new triggers each round to increase the chaos and your earnings2.

Satisfy the Elders' Monetary Demands: Each run, survive by paying tribute to three Elders who introduce devious game-changing tribulations2.

Master Multiple Boards: Highly varied game boards require fresh theorycrafting. Boards include themes like the Pyramid, Danger Wheel, and Pinball table2.

125+ Triggers, 50+ Boons: Use various triggers and boons to create unique strategies. Examples include spawning eggs with a Chicken, cutting coins in half with an Axe, and feeding a Whale until it blows every ball back out2.

Play in a Sandbox: Experiment in the Laballatory to hone your theory-crafting before a run, make a meme, or build an impossibly busted board2.

Mod Support on Day One: Create your own triggers and bring them to life with Ballionaire's Lua-based custom content API2.
